title: my memotion entry :)
body: I wanted an emote I could spam when I accidentally save my enemy with my ult when I'm playing poppy xD

replies.body: So cute!! I do this all the time when I'm playing Poppy haha. Thanks so much for sharing, good luck in the contest!! <3

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Hylia,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=tEeOQZFo,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2018-07-13T23:34:54.963+0000)
>
> So cute!! I do this all the time when I'm playing Poppy haha. Thanks so much for sharing, good luck in the contest!! <3

I do this too frequently xD thank you <3
Zelda? is that you?

Nice work.

Too bad Poppy sucks right now.
PepeHands
erm she recently got buffed and her dmg and tankyness before that were already pretty strong

> [{quoted}](name=Rihannsu,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=tEeOQZFo,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2018-07-13T21:34:31.331+0000)
>
> erm she recently got buffed and her dmg and tankyness before that were already pretty strong

She has a 49% win rate:

https://champion.gg/champion/Poppy/Top?

For someone that supposedly got recently buffed and has had "pretty strong" dmg and tankyness, that isn't very impressive.

she is reliant on enemy team composition. if picked properly she has way better results.

Half of these boards complaining about Yasuo can't even imagine how her screws him over.
It might not be OP level, but saying that Poppy sucks right now is definitely exaggerated, she is decent.
Since every f... champion... has dash or jump atm she can be hilariously broken at times.
Not a fan of the current Poppy emote that's in-game, but I would _ABSOLUTELY_ use this as one.
This one is awesome! :)
I need that in my life.
Good luck with the contest :D
beautiful

I don't wanna be that guy

But where's the snaggletooth?

Intensity

Yeah, I know that feeling. Good Memotion!

"Your task is to create a portrait of a single champion, from the **shoulders up**, showing an intense emotion."
